text: O vy shcho vvazhayete, ekvivalentnistʹ yavlyaye soboyu zakon ukhvalenyy dlya vas koly mayutʹ spravu z vbyvstvo - vilʹne dlya vilʹnoho, raba dlya raba, zhinky dlya zhinky. Yakshcho kozhnyy probachayetʹsya rodynoyu zhertvy, appreciative vidpovidʹ na poryadku dennomu, ta rivnopravna kompensatsiya povynna buty zaplachena. Tse ye alleviation z vashoho Lorda ta myloserdya. Budʹ khto khto porushuye poza tse zaznaye bolisnoho retribution
